item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Y Combinator and Power in Silicon Valley (87 points | 22 comments)
2. Raspberry Pi boosts Pi 5 performance with SDRAM tuning (143 points | 77 comments)
3. Lessons I learned working at an art gallery (175 points | 56 comments)
4. Ask questions of SQLite databases and CSV/JSON files in your terminal (44 points | 14 comments)
5. Show HN: Copper – Open-source robotics in Rust with deterministic log replay (112 points | 20 comments)
6. No need to email me about Cisco AnyConnect (66 points | 13 comments)
7. Fish have a brain microbiome – could humans have one too? (255 points | 100 comments)
8. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (December 2024) (280 points | 249 comments)
9. Rust in QEMU Roadmap (70 points | 13 comments)
10. 8 months of OCaml after 8 years of Haskell in production (2023) (188 points | 152 comments)

12. An English castle became a stork magnet (17 points | 3 comments)
13. Kapa.ai (YC S23) is hiring AI research and full-stack roles (EU timezone) ( | hide)
14. World Labs: Generate 3D worlds from a single image (366 points | 118 comments)

21. Accelerated AI Inference via Dynamic Execution Methods (57 points | 2 comments)
22. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (December 2024) (116 points | 261 comments)
23. Show HN: Flow – A dynamic task engine for building AI agents (101 points | 36 comments)
24. A better approach to gravity: how we made EGM2008 faster (59 points | 19 comments)
25. Optimality of Gerver's Sofa (100 points | 27 comments)
26. USC Student Rocket Group Shatters International Amateur Space Record (59 points | 46 comments)
27. Ethiopian wolves reported to feed on nectar (62 points | 18 comments)
28. Intel announces retirement of Pat Gelsinger (827 points | 659 comments)
29. High School Student's First App – NWS Weather Report (31 points | 5 comments)
30. Kenya and "the decline of the greatest coffee" (2021) (188 points | 175 comments)
